title: Things are going extremely well
desc: This is what I mean by extended cognition

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
I bring my problems 
 to the desert
panels.hovertext: tell your woes to the horse

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
I let the horse 
 deal with them
panels.hovertext: tell your woes to the horse
